attributes.action: Make it law that any vehicle travelling on a motorway or dual carriageway must have it's headlights on at all times.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I cover many miles in a Land Rover (due to work) which has no rear side windows and hence has huge blind spots.  I rely solely on the use of my wing mirrors when driving.  In poor visibility (fog, drizzle, heavy rain, diminishing light) it is extrememly difficult to see other vehicles which are about to overtake you if they haven't got their lights on.

I can only imagine the problem is the same for HGV drivers and van drivers.  Surely this would be a sensible way of making the roads safer, as not all drivers turn their headlights on when the conditions call for it.
